DOC.detailed_description: Aflatoxins harmful by-product mold Aspergillus flavus A. parasiticus major contaminant agricultural produce maize . Acute aflatoxin exposure ( i.e. , aflatoxicosis ) lead jaundice , vomit , abdominal pain , liver failure , document fatality rate high 40 % . Kenya experience extreme aflatoxin exposure fatal , recur aflatoxicosis outbreak . Numerous clinical trial find heat processed calcium dioctahedral smectite clay [ i.e. , Air Classified Calcium Silicate ( ACCS100 ) ] safe effective binding aflatoxin decrease bioavailability subsequently reduce toxin-induced effect . The investigator propose pilot test effectiveness , acceptability , palatability ACCS100 high-risk Kenyan population . If successful , ACCS100 could scaled-up use Kenya prevent aflatoxin-associated mortality high-risk period . To accomplish objective , investigator recruit fifty health adult crossover study . Each participant spend one week consume ACCS100 one week consume calcium carbonate placebo . Daily first morning void urine sample monitor effectiveness reduce aflatoxin bioavailability , periodic questionnaire assess acceptance palatability .
